This page is all about karate. This is one of my sports what I am very good at (according to me). My current belt is yellow with a black tab. You should see the list of belts below.

Belts:

  • White
  • White with a red stripe
  • Red with a white stripe
  • Red
  • Yellow
  • Orange
  • Green
  • Blue
  • Purple
  • Brown
  • Black

    Here is the 5 best tips for karate:

    I. Always listen to the sensei.

    II. Do a warm up before you start.

    III. When you spa always bounce around.

    IV. Whenever it is an assessment try your hardest.

    V. Be a team player.

    P.S Always do what you are told.
